parameters: All the actors, enemies and skills are different from
those in previous maps! Look at the Id's carefully
if you want to make your own game from this!
Welcome to this demo, lets enjoy a real strategic battle!
Do you need instruction of this special demo battle?
This is a Turn-Based Strategy game without RPG elements.
Your goal is to destory the enemy's crystal while defending
Each turn you will receive 20 gold from your home crystal and
10 gold from your 'fort'. The enemies will gain gold in the
The fort also provides +20% hp regeneration, and +20% defence.
Try to occupy as many forts as you can! The color of the fort
Once you have 200 gold, you can buy a unit! The purchase option
will automatically appear! You can also click home crystal to
Enemy will purchase random unit when they have enough money!
Other than the home Crystal, you also have a defense crystal
which can attack nearby enemies. The defense crystal won't
We are not using enemy level plugins in this demo.
Therefore, to make it a fair game, you battlers won't gain exp.
Now, lets set the difficulty! I suggest starting from easy!
Let's see how far you can go!
High difficulty makes ai more willing to choose the best
action (if AI is good). I personally think hard and normal
doesn't make a big difference, perhaps my AI is not good enough.
Allow Enemies to gain more gold than nomal.
Enemy gpt(gold per turn) = normal gpt * cheat rate.
Select the cheat level. 100% is a fair game.
One day, a new hero will show up and clear this game.
You have \V[16] gold, you can purchase units!
You have enough gold, but no spot for new units!
You need 200 gold to purchase a unit! you have \V[16] gold.
Difficult will affect enemy's selection of move.
Lower difficult will make enemies move more randomly.
High difficulty makes game harder only when the ai is good.
Allow Enemies to gain more gold than nomal.
Enemy gpt(gold per turn) = normal gpt * cheat rate.
Select the cheat level. 100% is a fair game.
